data.title: Troup County School System
data.meta_description: About TCSS - Troup County School System
data.text:
Troup County is at the bend between metropolitan and suburban. Housing the cities of LaGrange, West Point and Hogansville, Troup County is just south of Atlanta and directly on the Georgia and Alabama line. With a population of over 70,000, we are conveniently located just minutes from the lake and only a few hours from the Florida panhandle beaches.

Are you considering moving or buying a home in Troup County but first you would like to know more about Troup County School System (TCSS), or are you a current Troup County resident and want to learn more about what TCSS offers? Look no further!
